p: Fresh leaves of five medicinal plants, M. longifolia, M. piperita, M. spicata, O. basilicum, and R. officinalis, were collected from district Peshawar. Plant specimens were taxonomically identified in the Centre of Plant Biodiversity by Dr. Syed Mukaram Shah (PhD), and voucher specimens were deposited in the Herbarium of Department of Botany, University of Peshawar.
